name: Undead Malice
flavor: At the start of any level 10 undead's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.effect: The undead activates a Malice feature available to undead of level 9 or lower.
The undead attempts to rend the vitality of their foes. Each enemy within 5 squares of the undead makes a **Might test**.
effects.tier1: 10 corruption damage; the target loses 2 Recoveries
effects.tier2: 8 corruption damage; the target loses 1 Recovery

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target who has fewer Recoveries than they would lose is also weakened (save ends).

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: This ability can't be used by a minion.
